name: Wrapped Trade AI
description: TradeAI is engineered to capitalize on this revolutionary juncture. Our mission is to bring advanced trading capabilities to all levels of investors through a platform that is secure, intelligent, and highly responsive to market conditions. TradeAI leverages Bittensor’s infrastructure to overcome the current limitations of DeFi trading. Bittensor’s decentralized neural network provides the backbone for our AI algorithms, ensuring continuous learning and improvement of trading strategies. ##General Mechanism Users deposit funds into the project to start using our services. TradeAI will automatically monitors data on the blockchain and alert users with best rate trades/arbitrage, users decide if he wants to execute orders based on the TradeAI’s collected data. Users can also pre-set preferences for later precision. ##Ecosystem - Spot Trader: Users can execute trades instantly based on AI-driven market analysis. - Top Tokens: An AI-curated list of top-performing tokens is automatically generated and updated. - Watchlist: Users can set up and manage a personal list of tokens to track. - AI Alert: Real-time alerts powered by AI for significant market movements and trading opportunities. - Statistical Functions: + Ranking of top traders on DEX such as Uniswap, Curve, PancakeSwap, etc. + Display of trader information including profit and loss (PNL), trading volume, and more. + Real-time statistics of top tokens on DEXs, ensuring timely and critical market insights. + Presentation of detailed token information using AI algorithm.
